sms.sentInfo: Enter the verification code sent to the phone number {{phoneNumber}}.
sms.verificationFail: Oops! Something went wrong, try again or generate a new code

email.sentInfo: we have sent a verification code to your email address. Click link to verify it
email.errorTryAgainInSeconds: Mail hasn't arrived? Try again in {{number}} seconds
email.errorTooManyRequestsInSeconds: Too many requests. Try again in {{number}} seconds

createShelter.agreeForShelterVerification: I agree to get my accommodation verified (volunteer visit)
createShelter.addPhotoHeader: Add a photo of the offered accommodation
createShelter.accommodationHeader: Provide information on the accommodation you are offering
createShelter.groupsHostAccepts: What types of groups will you accept?
createShelter.addPhotoHeaderWithLimit3: Add a photo of the offered accommodation (maximum 3)

userRegistration.agreeOnSmsCommunication: I want to get notified via SMS about potential match offers
userRegistration.proposeCreateAccount: If you don't have an account, you can create one.

validations.passwordLength: Password length must be at least 8 characters

errors.duplicatedMail: Email linked to selected login provider account is already used in our system. Please try to log again via different login method.

match.confirmed: Your guest/host has just confirmed an offer. Contact him/her to arrange the details.
match.usersWarning:
For safety purposes, keep your relatives informed about who you are sheltering. Just in case:
  • verify the identity of the person you are sheltering,
  • make sure the group composition matches the original description

host.formSentThanks: Thank you for expressing your willingness to help. Your property has been added to the list. We will search our database of people in need and once we match the right person we will let you know.
host.received: Thank you very much for confirming the proposal received. As soon as we receive both confirmations, we will let you know.

match.rejected: Your potential guest/host has rejected the offer.  Your submission will go back into the pool, we'll let you know the next offer as soon as we can find it.

refuge.rejection: Thank you for confirming your decision.  Your submission will go back into the pool, we will let you know about the next proposal as soon as we  can find one.

hostInformation.takesPregnancy: I will accept a person in an advanced state  of pregnancy (over 6 months)

groupInformation.pregnancy: The group includes a person with an advanced pregnancy (over 6 months)
groupInformation.disability: There is a person with a disability in the group
groupInformation.multicultural: The group includes people from different nationalities
groupInformation.animals: The group is accompanied by a pet
groupInformation.elders: There is an elderly person in the group

generic.peopleInGroup: Number of people in the group: {{number}}
generic.name: Name

shelter.groupDetails: Information about the people you are  moving with
shelter.imWithPregnantOver6Months:
I am, or I am accompanied by a person in
advanced pregnancy (over 6 months)
shelter.whatIsTargetCountry: What country are you looking to stay in?

resetPassword.header: Provide new password for your account
resetPassword.emailSent: Password reset email sent — check your mailbox
resetPassword.success: Your password has been successfully changed
resetPassword.detail: If you do not remember your password, enter your email address. We will send you a link to the password reset form.

edit.editAccommodationHeader: Edit information on the accommodation you are offering

renew.re-activateOffer: Do you want to re-activate the application/offer?

checks.accountInCreation: Your account is being created, refresh page after couple seconds.
checks.emailAlreadyInUse: Email linked to selected login provider account is already used in our system. please try to log again via different login method.

confirmation.content:
If you have {{accepted}}, wait for the other person's decision. Once the other side accepts, you will receive an email with contact information.
In case of {{cancellation}}, your application will be returned to the pool of active applications. We will inform you by email about the next offer.

popup.description: Notify us of any problems  using the form below
popup.thanksForLettingKnow: Thank you for letting us know about this situation. We will look for another match for you.

reasons.guestNotNeedHelp: My guest doesn't require accommodation anymore
reasons.hostCantHelp: My host can't provide accommodation anymore
reasons.rejectedAfterContact: I/other party rejected offer after first contact
reasons.notShowUp: Host/guest didn't show up to agreed place

popup.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete your entry?

renew.expiredMsg: Your application / offer expired due to lack of activity

welcomePage.appDescription: We help refugees find automatically free accommodation in Poland, Czechia, Hungary and Slovakia, offered by people and institutions willing to help.
welcomePage.comingSoon: Coming soon: transport, job search and medical advice functionalities
welcomePage.waysToStaySafe: Learn about ways to stay safe

errors.emailExist: User with this account already exist
errors.phoneExist: This phone number is already linked to another account
errors.phoneLinkingFailed: Error occurred while linking phone number to your account. Make sure your phone number is not linked to the other account or try again using different number

publicShelters.addShelterMail: If you want to add your public shelter, please contact us at publicshelters@uasos.org.
publicShelters.description: You can find here a list of publicly available shelters. Remember to call the place and confirm the availability before departing.

popup:staySafe.rememberToStaySafe: Remember to stay safe Line 1 lorem ipsum Line 2 lorem ipsum
popup:staySafe.exchangeFacebook: Exchange your Facebook/Instagram details, make a video call before live meeting.
popup:staySafe.useTranslator: In case you don't speak the same language - connect via e-mail/WhatsApp/SMS and use e.g. Google Translate.
